author: NBCNews.com
title: Nobel winner Jennifer Doudna’s advice for young scientists: ‘Go for it’
description: Dr. Jennifer Doudna is one of four U.S. scientists to win the Nobel prize this week. She shares the prize with French microbiologist Emmanuelle Charpentier for their groundbreaking work on a biological method called CRISPR.
source.name: NBC News

author: NBCNews.com
title: Counterintelligence chief speaks out on foreign interference in election
description: In a rare interview with NBC’s Richard Engel, Bill Evanina says Russia, China and Iran are engaged in “enhancing and exacerbating protests on the West Coast” as Election Day nears.

author: NBCNews.com
title: Hurricane Delta makes landfall in Mexico, takes aim for U.S.
description: The storm hit Mexico with strong winds, washing boats ashore and tearing down piers. Delta could next make landfall in Louisiana, where thousands are still cleaning up from Hurricane Laura.

author: NBCNews.com
title: Wisconsin grapples with surge in coronavirus cases
description: Wisconsin is now seeing more than 2,000 daily cases of Covid-19 as a statewide order limiting indoor public gatherings is expected to take effect.

author: NBCNews.com
title: Trump: Getting treatment for Covid was 'a blessing in disguise'
description: President Trump posted a video outside of the Oval Office at the White House to praise the Regeneron treatment he received and characterized him undergoing treatment for coronavirus as a "blessing in disguise."
source.name: NBC News

author: NBCNews.com
title: Trump now open to smaller Covid relief deals after halting negotiations
description: Hours after President Trump said he wouldn’t negotiate a Covid-19 relief package until after the election, the president signaled he’s open to piecemeal plans on things like $1,200 stimulus checks. Democrats accused Trump of playing politics.
source.name: NBC News

author: NBCNews.com
title: Trump returns to Oval Office despite ongoing Covid treatment
description: President Trump returned to the Oval Office for the first time since testing positive for Covid-19 on Thursday. Trump’s physician, Dr. Sean Conley, reports the president’s been “symptom-free for over 24 hours.”
source.name: NBC News
